Increasing an attribute score (BRAWN, AGILITY, INTELLECT, CUNNING, WILLPOWER, or PRESENCE) costs 10*(your current score + 1) xp.

 Increasing a career skill (bolded) costs 5*(your current skill rank + 1) xp.

 Increasing a non-career skill costs 5*(your current skill rank + 2) xp.

 Your current skill rank is represented by green triangles.
Wound threshold: determines how much physical damage your character can withstand before they are knocked out. Increased by Brawn.
Strain threshold: determines how much psychological or mental damage your character can withstand before they are stunned, dazed or incapacitated. Increased by Willpower.
Soak value: determines how much damage your character can shrug off before being seriously wounded. Equal to Brawn rating.
